thread.title: Shutterfly to Announce First Quarter 2018 Financial Results and Conduct Conference Call and Webcast on Tuesday, May 1, 2018 at 2:00 PM PT

author: cnbc.com
title: Shutterfly to Announce First Quarter 2018 Financial Results and Conduct Conference Call and Webcast on Tuesday, May 1, 2018 at 2:00 PM PT
text:
REDWOOD CITY, Calif.--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- Shutterfly , Inc. (NASDAQ: SFLY), the leading online retailer and manufacturer of high-quality personalized products and services, will release its financial results for the first quarter ended March 31, 2018 after the financial markets close on Tuesday, May 1, 2018. The press release will be posted on the Shutterfly website at www.Shutterflyinc.com in the “Investor Relations” and “Press Releases” sections. Christopher North, president and chief executive officer, and Mike Pope, senior vice president and chief financial officer, will host a conference call and simultaneous webcast to discuss the company’s financial results and outlook at 2:00 PM PT (5:00 PM ET).
To access the conference call, please dial (888) 243-4451 or (412) 542-4135, and ask to be joined into the Shutterfly call. The webcast of the conference at www.Shutterflyinc.com in the “Investor Relations” section. A replay of the conference for two weeks. To listen to the replay, please dial (877) 344-7529 or (412) 317-0088 and enter access code 10119192.
About Shutterfly, Inc.
Shutterfly, Inc. is the leading digital retailer and manufacturer of high-quality personalized products and services. Founded in 1999, Shutterfly brings your photos to life in photo books, gifts, and cards and stationery – through its flagship Shutterfly products, premium offerings in its Tiny Prints boutique, as well as wedding invitations and stationery for every step of the planning process; and through BorrowLenses, the premier online marketplace for photographic and video equipment rentals. Shutterfly, Inc. also operates Shutterfly Business Solutions, delivering high quality digital printing services to the enterprise market, and Lifetouch, the leader in school photography. For more information about Shutterfly, Inc. (SFLY), visit www.shutterflyinc.com .
